summary: Baloran is a male Nord specializing in two-handed melee.
descriptionHtml:
Baloran is a male Nord who specializes in two-handed battleaxes. He can be found in the Temple of Talos in Windhelm and will return there if you dismiss him. He is very honorable and will not tolerate criminal behavior.

[list][*]light foot perk (won't set off traps)[/*]
[*]essential[/*]
[*]marriable (will open a general goods shop)[/*]
[*]will not tolerate criminal behavior[/*]
[*]two-handed perks specializing in battleaxes[/*]
[/list]
Baloran should work with or without any DLC. Place this follower before any mods which alter follower behavior.
author: BananaDongle
